flawed_nl_solution:
Each cm contains 10mm so 1165cm is 1165*10 = <<1165*10=11650>>11650mm
154-150 = <<154-150=4>>4 pieces of the rope are 100mm each in length
The 4 pieces have a total length of 4*100 = <<4*100=400>>400mm
There is a length of 11650-400 = <<11650-400=12150>>12150mm left
12150 mm into 150 equal pieces will give each piece as 12150/150 = <<12150/150=81>>81mm long
#### 81

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 11250, not 12150. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
